titleInfo.title: The energy dependence of the saturation scale in DIS at low x

mods.abstract: Consistency of the previously suggested color-dipole representation of deep-inelastic scattering (DIS) and vector-meson production at low x with DGLAP evolution allows one to predict the exponent of the W-2 dependence of the saturation scale, A(sat)(2)(W-2) similar to (W-2)(C2). One finds C-2(theory) = 0.27 in agreement with the model-independent analysis of the experimental data from HERA on deep-inelastic electron scattering. (c) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
